column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hello Eesha - We appreciate your great review
column2: and we thank you for rating us so highly. Pricing is never easy in the food-service industry
column3: especially at JINYA. We are always forced to find balance between paying our expenditures while also achieving a healthy profit for our businesses to grow. We also believe we offer a premium product
column4: a dining environment and service that's unmatched by most of our competitors.
